davinci.title: Da Vinci, Art School
davinci.description: Here's where everything started. I remember to have created a few static pages with HTML and CSS during web design classes. These subjects such as UI/UX Design and Web Programming caught my attention completely and I felt like 'ok, definitely I need to know more'.

acamica.title: Full Stack bootcamp
acamica.description: My first proffesional approach to web programming and the community from Argentina. Lorem ipsum dolor, sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. oracle.title: Frontend Developer, CX Consultant (Oracle Commerce Cloud)
oracle.description: I met incredible and very talented people I could learn from. Definitely a thing you can label as 'start with the right foot'. As a CX consultant at Oracle, my role was divided pretty much in two parts: in one hand, I had to attend all client's concerns and help them out with they desired configurations over the Oracle eCommerce Cloud. Second, any custom behaviour our tool could not doing out of the box should be coded from scratch. And right there is how I come as Frontend Developer officially.

fizzmod.title: Frontend Developer
fizzmod.description: I continued in the eCommerce world for a bit more. I got my first experiences with React and Redux, and I joined a pretty small team with a higher ownership than any experience I had.

blockfi.title: Frontend Team Lead
blockfi.description: One of my most meaningful experiences. I learned from worldclass engineers as well as I could growth as not only Frontend engineer but also as individual. I joined the Blockfi team as junior developer and I finished my career with 3 developers in charge, having built two applications from scratch.
